mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reviewReport WHERE reviewReportNo > 0

SELECT c.reviewTitle, c.reviewReportNo, c.memberId, c.reviewNo, c.reviewReportContent, c.reviewReportDate from ( select rownum rn, a.reviewReportNo, a.memberId, a.reviewNo, a.reviewReportContent, a.reviewReportDate, b.reviewTitle from reviewReport a, review b where a.reviewNo = b.reviewNo and rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) c WHERE c.rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviewReport(reviewReportNo, memberId, reviewNo,reviewReportContent) VALUES(seq_reviewReport.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{reviewNo},#{reviewReportContent})
mapper.select: SELECT b.reviewTitle,a.reviewReportNo,a.memberId,a.reviewNo,a.reviewReportContent,a.reviewReportDate FROM reviewReport a, review b WHERE a.reviewNo = b.reviewNo and reviewReportNo = #{reviewReportNo}
